value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: A new approach for dynamic Power BI visuals?
value.excerpt: Want to give report users a way to control Power BI visuals dynamically? Don't want to use the personalize visual feature? Interesting!!! value.title: Are you thinking about your tooltips in Power BI?
value.excerpt: The base tooltips in Power BI are fine. But are you overusing them? Adding everything to them in your visuals? Adam gives you some things to think about with your tooltips!
